name: Pick up point selector
headline: Allow customers to select a pick up point inside the PDP.
overview: The app enables the customer to search stores near by selected zip code directy in PDP, besides improve shopping experience allowing to add an item to the cart with selected a pick up point with only one click.
features: Add a list of closest pick up points with stock of the selected product
Add a buy button that also selects the pick up point with one click
